description:
Flourless bean cupcakes that are light and you
can't tell that they contain beans.
keywords: Cupcake,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Chocolate Bean Cupcakes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Line a 12 cup cake baking tin with cupcake liners. Set aside.
In a food processor add kidney beans, vanilla essence, sunflower oil and 2 eggs and process on low speed for 5 minutes or until you get a smooth consistency.
Then add the rest of the eggs, cocoa powder, sea salt, bi carb soda, baking powder and raw sugar.
Process for another 1 minute or until all ingredients are well combined.
Remove from oven and leave in tin for 10 minutes before transferring to a cooling rack.
Serve on it's own or with a scoop of ice cream. Enjoy!
Divide batter into the 12 cupcake liners and bake for 20 minutes or until skewer comes out clean.
